channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: A sinkhole swallowed a car in #Seoul, injuring two people. T
item.description: A sinkhole swallowed a car in #Seoul, injuring two people. The pavement collapsed beneath a white SUV while driving on a four-lane road. Watch video for more details

item.title: Napoli have signed #RomeluLukaku from #Chelsea, the Serie A
item.description: Napoli have signed #RomeluLukaku from #Chelsea, the Serie A club announced

item.title: It's no secret that global star #PriyankaChopra loves some g
item.description: It's no secret that global star #PriyankaChopra loves some good old desi nuskhe!
